comment: Sum of transpiration, evaporation, interception and sublimation.

Please provide soil moisture for all depth layers (i.e. 3D-field), and indicate depth in m. If depth varies over time or space, see instructions for depth layers on <https://www.isimip.org/protocol/preparing-simulation-files>.

Temperature of each soil layer. Reported as "missing" for grid cells occupied entirely by "sea". If daily resolution not possible, please provide monthly. If depth varies over time or space, see instructions for depth layers on <https://www.isimip.org/protocol/preparing-simulation-files>.
Includes sublimation.
As kg carbon m⁻². Stand total and PFT information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Above Ground Vegetation Biomass
comment: As kg carbon m⁻²Stand total and PFT information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Below Ground Vegetation Biomass
comment: As kg carbon m⁻². Stand total and PFT information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Above Ground Litter Pool
comment: Species information is essential. Stand total and PFT information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Below Ground Litter Pool
comment: Only if models separates below-ground litter and soil carbon. Species information is essential.

Soil carbon excluding belowground litter if your model reports clitter. If not including below-ground litter, i.e. only report csoil and document this in the model documentation. Grid cell total and species information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Soil Pool in each layer
comment: Soil carbon excluding belowground litter if your model reports clitter. If not including below-ground litter, i.e. only report csoil and document this in the model documentation. Grid cell total and species information is essential. If possible, provide soil carbon for all depth layers (i.e. 3D-field), and indicate depth in m. Otherwise, provide soil carbon integrated over entire soil depth.

long_name: Carbon in Products of Land Use Change
comment: Products generated during Land-use change. Removed carbon should not go into the soil but into the product pool. Please use the product classes used within your model and document them in the model documentation.
Including sapwood and hardwood.
Including fine and coarse roots.

long_name: Carbon Mass in Coarse Woody Debris
Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Gross Primary Production on Land
comment: As kg carbon m⁻² s⁻¹. Stand total and Species information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to Autotrophic (plant) Respiration on Land
comment: As kg carbon m⁻² s⁻¹. Stand total and species information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass Flux out of Atmosphere due to Net Primary Production on Land
comment: As kg carbon m⁻² s⁻¹. Stand total and species information is essential.

long_name: Carbon Mass Flux into Atmosphere due to Heterotrophic Respiration on Land
comment: As kg carbon m⁻² s⁻¹. Stand total and Species information is essential.
As kg carbon * m-2 * s-1

long_name: Nitrogen Mass in Above Ground Litter Pool
comment: As kg Nitrogen m-2 a-1

long_name: Nitrogen Mass in Below Ground Litter Pool
comment: As kg Nitrogen m-2 a-1
As kg Nitrogen m-2 a-1

long_name: Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation
comment: Value between 0 and 100. Grid cell total and PFT information is essential.
Stand total and species information is essential. If lai is static, the timestep specifier "fixed" can be used.
The canopy evaporation+sublimation (if present in model).
100 highest trees per hectare.
For models including natural regeneration this variable may not make sense, please report domhei.
Mean height of the 100 highest trees per hectare.
DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total per species

long_name: Remaining Stem Number after Disturbance and Management by DBH-Class
comment: DBH-Class Resolution: Either DBH-Classes or Total per Species
DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total per species
As kg carbon m⁻² s⁻¹

long_name: Removed Stem Numbers by DBH-Class by Natural Mortality
comment: As trees per hectare. DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total per species

long_name: Removed Stem Numbers by DBH-Class by Management
comment: As trees per hectare. DBH class resolution: Either DBH classes or total per species

Soil type as used by your model. Please include a description of each type in the model documentation (under "Other data sets used"). Please also include a link to a database/paper describing the parameters and values associated with these soil types.
